EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_London_MeetUps_Q418.Confirmation Template
EmailTemplate.subject: You're confirmed for the Meetup!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Metrics, beyond "it depends" Meetup on Tuesday, October 2nd at Pivotal London <[[https://pivotal.io/locations/london]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there.
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email at preay@pivotal.io <[[mailto:preay@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team Event Details <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/london-meetup-oct18.html]]>
